text: André S. Labarthe (18 December 1931 – 5 March 2018) was a French actor, movie producer and director. He starred alongside Anna Karina in the 1962 movie Vivre sa vie (1962). He was born in Oloron-Sainte-Marie, Pyrénées-Atlantiques, France. He appeared in many movies directed by Jean-Luc Godard. Labarthe was the director of many television documentaries and was known for his work Cinéastes de notre temps. He also starred in L'amour fou (1969), Les Enfants jouent à la Russie (1993) and in JLG/JLG – Self-Portrait in December (1995). Labarthe died in Paris on 5 March 2018 at the age of 86.Hommage à André S.
